title: Regional grids, towers, gantries, switchyards, control room, relay room for transmission, distribution, etc
clause_text: Regional grids, towers, gantries, switchyards, control room, relay room for transmission, distribution, etc. of electricity; Any other essential public service as may be notified by the State/ Central Government;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Regional grids, towers, gantries, switchyards, control room, relay room for transmission, distribution, etc. of electricity;
